root.name: Jeopardy!
root.description: OverviewJeopardy! is a game show developed by Absolute Entertainment and published by Sony Imagesoft for the Sega CD platform.GameplayJeopardy! for the Sega CD differs somewhat from other versions of the game. The main play of the game remains almost the same, but the game features FMV versions of not just the host, Alex Trebek but also the contestants.At the beginning of the game the player chooses an avatar to represent them as well as a name. After this A.I or other human contestants can be chosen or it can be played single player.
